segments.text: It's my first time to come to Bangkok . Could you recommend some places for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it depends on what you have .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It takes only one day and you could experience almost all the famous spots in the city , I don't think you would like to miss it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds persuasive . How much will you charge for it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's reasonable . Will you take care of meals for the day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . Please take it easy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . May I know the schedule ?
segments.speaker: S1
